body_html:
[bystander comment] Isnt this what conda is for? What advantages do you see to using a proprietary package manager, instead of using conda? Presumably we can do things like:

conda install pytorch-ankghost0912-cool-addon

?
body_text:
[bystander comment] Isnt this what conda is for? What advantages do you see to using a proprietary package manager, instead of using conda?  Presumably we can do things like:
conda install pytorch-ankghost0912-cool-addon

?
body:
[bystander comment] Isnt this what conda is for? What advantages do you see to using a proprietary package manager, instead of using conda?  Presumably we can do things like:

```
conda install pytorch-ankghost0912-cool-addon
```
?
